title: BOTIM - Video and Voice Call

creator: Algento Cloud Computing Limited
descriptionHtml:
Enjoy secure and private group video and voice calls; digital KYC; easy money transfers; built-in emoji dashboards; mobile recharges; bill payments; online games and much more! Get encrypted calling and messaging on 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G, and WiFi connections without using a VPN. Conversations on BOTIM are secured with AES-256 encryption, allowing you to connect in a fast, secure, and reliable way.

MAKE ENCRYPTED CALLS ACROSS BORDERS 🌍
We’re not just a Dubai video calling app! Whether it’s a free call to India or a free call to India,, BOTIM lets you make secure and encrypted connections with people across the globe!

CONNECT IN GROUP CHATS & CALLS 📞
The only thing better than a free video call is a free group video call with your loved ones! BOTIM lets you join secure and private group chats with up to 500 contacts and make group video calls with up to 21 people at the same time!

MAKE SECURE PAYMENTS 🔐
Say bye to bank queues and hello to hassle-free transfers! Simply tap on contacts to make secure transfers within the UAE. Our quick digital KYC process gets you verified within minutes, so you can transfer and receive money instantly!

MAKE PHONE PAYMENTS & RECHARGES 💰
Need to pay an Etisalat bill? Have to make a mobile top-up? We’ve got you! Make secure bill payments and mobile recharges for every major network provider across the world, including:
UAE: Etisalat, DU
India: Airtel, Vodafone, BSNL, Jio, MTNL, Vi India, Pakistan: Telenor, Ufone, Warid, Zong, Jazz
Philippines: Globe, Cherry Mobile, Smart(SunCellular)
Bangladesh: Teletalk, Robi, Banglalink, Airtel, Grameenphone
Nepal: Ncell, NepalTelecom, SmartCell
Egypt: Etisalat, Vodafone, Orange

BECOME A BOTIM VIP MEMBER ⭐
Subscribe and upgrade to an ad-free experience with BOTIM’s VIP Membership program! Get early access to upcoming features and enjoy higher network quality, HD calling, background blur, and an exclusive VIP badge on your BOTIM profile!

SHARE MOMENTS 📸
You can do a lot more with BOTIM than just make a free video call! Sharing life’s moments by sending photos, videos, documents, and voice messages to people around the world!

RELIABLE CONNECTIONS 📡
Making a UAE video call? Got an online meeting in London? We’ve got you covered! BOTIM’s adaptable call quality ensures smooth connections across all network connections across borders.

FASTER, SMOOTHER CALLING⚡️
BOTIM is a calling app that is built to offer the best in-app experience. Our troubleshooting technology lets you share feedback after every call and ensures that we improve your BOTIM experience every day.

CONNECT AND COMPETE IN ONLINE GAMES 🎮
Stay entertained with games on BOTIM! Compare scores and compete with friends online. Connect with players in live voice chats and climb the ranks in popular games such as YouDraw, YouKout, and YouLudo!

STEP INTO A HEALTHIER LIFE 🏃‍♀️
Get your feet moving with BOTIM! Use the in-app step counter to keep track of your daily movements. Keep the competition running with a ranked view of step counts of your friends and contacts!

QURAN KAREEM AT YOUR FINGERTIPS 📖
Discover the Holy Quran with BOTIM! Use the explore section to access verses from the Holy Quran in HD quality. Get top-notch readability on a mobile-friendly interface directly on your phone!
*Operator data charges may apply.
If you have queries or suggestions, email us at feedback@botim.me

Terms of VIP Membership

The subscription fee will be charged to your iTunes account upon confirmation of purchase.
Subscriptions auto-renew at the cost of the chosen package, unless canceled at least 24 hours in advance prior to the end of the current period. You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

Privacy Policy: https://botim.me/terms/#privacy
Terms of Service: https://botim.me/terms/
descriptionShort: Botim is a free video and voice calling app used by millions all over the world!

SHARE MOMENTS 📸

RELIABLE CONNECTIONS 📡

FASTER, SMOOTHER CALLING⚡️

SHARE MOMENTS 📸
You can do a lot more with BOTIM than just make a free video call! Sharing life’s moments by sending photos, videos, documents, and voice messages to people around the world!

RELIABLE CONNECTIONS 📡
Making a UAE video call? Got an online meeting in London? We’ve got you covered! BOTIM’s adaptable call quality ensures smooth connections across all network connections across borders.

FASTER, SMOOTHER CALLING⚡️
BOTIM is a calling app that is built to offer the best in-app experience. Our troubleshooting technology lets you share feedback after every call and ensures that we improve your BOTIM experience every day.

CONNECT AND COMPETE IN ONLINE GAMES 🎮
Stay entertained with games on BOTIM! Compare scores and compete with friends online. Connect with players in live voice chats and climb the ranks in popular games such as YouDraw, YouKout, and YouLudo!

STEP INTO A HEALTHIER LIFE 🏃‍♀️
Get your feet moving with BOTIM! Use the in-app step counter to keep track of your daily movements. Keep the competition running with a ranked view of step counts of your friends and contacts!

QURAN KAREEM AT YOUR FINGERTIPS 📖
Discover the Holy Quran with BOTIM! Use the explore section to access verses from the Holy Quran in HD quality. Get top-notch readability on a mobile-friendly interface directly on your phone!
*Operator data charges may apply.
If you have queries or suggestions, email us at feedback@botim.me

Terms of VIP Membership

The subscription fee will be charged to your iTunes account upon confirmation of purchase.
Subscriptions auto-renew at the cost of the chosen package, unless canceled at least 24 hours in advance prior to the end of the current period. You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

Privacy Policy: https://botim.me/terms/#privacy

title: BOTIM - Video and Voice Call

creator: Algento Cloud Computing Limited
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Botim - making your life easier and simpler 🙌

Botim, the most loved and trusted communication platform has transformed into an ultra platform 🚀. The new intuitive interface and advanced features aim at performing multiple tasks for you, offering you ease and convenience every day along with complete security. No matter where you stay in the world, you can interact, and share all you like with your loved ones. 💙

Download Botim and make the most of the following services:

BOTIM VOIP: Enjoy secure and private group video and voice calls; digital KYC; easy money transfers; built-in emoji dashboards; mobile recharges; bill payments; online games and much more! Get encrypted calling and messaging on 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G, and WiFi connections without using a VPN.
Conversations 💬on Botim are secured with AES-256 encryption, allowing you to connect in a fast, secure, and reliable way.

MAKE ENCRYPTED CALLS ACROSS BORDERS 📞
We're not just a Dubai video-calling app! Whether it's a free call to a country or a free call from another country, Botim lets you make secure and encrypted connections with people across the globe!

CONNECT IN GROUP CHATS & CALLS 👪
Botim lets you join secure and private group chats with up to 500 contacts and make group video calls with up to 21 people at the same time!

MAKE PHONE PAYMENTS & RECHARGES💸
Need to pay an Etisalat bill? Have to make a mobile top-up? We've got you! Make secure bill payments and mobile recharges for every major network provider across the world, including:
UAE: Etisalat, DU
India: Airtel, Vodafone, BSL, Jio, MTL, Vi India, Pakistan: Telenor, Ufone, Warid, Zong, Jazz Philippines: Globe, Cherry Mobile, Smart (SunCellular)
Bangladesh: Teletalk, Robi, Banglalink, Airtel, Grameenphone

BECOME A BOTIM VIP MEMBER🌟
Subscribe and upgrade to an ad-free experience with Botim’s VIP Membership program! Get early access to upcoming features and enjoy higher network quality, HD calling, background blur, and an exclusive VIP badge on your Botim profile!

BOTIM MONEY💰
Sending and Receiving money has never been this easy. With Botim’s fast and secure International Money Transfer services, send money anytime, anywhere.

International and Local Money Transfer:
If you're using Botim in the UAE, you can quickly and easily send money to your loved ones 💕. Experience the power of seamless, borderless money transfer across 170+ countries with Botim!

BOTIM SMART 🤓
Introducing Botim Smart, the all-in-one solution for government services, bill payments, and home services. With everything you need in one place and easy access from your phone, life is simple and easy.

Emirates ID Issue and Renewal 🆔

With just a few taps on your smartphone, and without visiting a government office, you can submit your application and receive your new Emirates ID within a few days.

BOTIM STORES: Experience the best of intuitive conversational commerce🛒. From groceries to fashion, and electronics to home decor, you can have everything delivered to your doorstep in the most convenient of ways.

BOTIM HOME: Your one-stop solution for all kinds of important services you could have asked for. Be it home services🏠, pharmacy💊, or cleaning services🧹, we've got you covered.

CONNECT AND COMPETE IN ONLINE GAMES
Stay entertained with games 🎮on Botim! Connect with players in live voice chats and climb the ranks in popular games such as YouDraw, YouKout, and YouLudo!

STEP INTO A HEALTHIER LIFE
Use the in-app step counter which integrates with the Health app and uses Apple Health Kit to keep track of your daily movements🚶.

QURAN KAREEM AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Discover the Holy Quran with Botim! Use the explore section to access verses from the Holy Quran in HD quality 📖 .
*Operator data charges may apply.

All Fintech services provided by Botim are powered by Payby, a UAE Central Bank Licensed Entity

Privacy Policy: https://botim.me/terms #privacy
Terms of Service: https://botim.me/terms/

Welcome to Botim - making your life easier and simpler 🙌

Botim, the most loved and trusted communication platform has transformed into an ultra platform 🚀. The new intuitive interface and advanced features aim at performing multiple tasks for you, offering you ease and convenience every day along with complete security. No matter where you stay in the world, you can interact, and share all you like with your loved ones. 💙

Download Botim and make the most of the following services:

BOTIM VOIP: Enjoy secure and private group video and voice calls; digital KYC; easy money transfers; built-in emoji dashboards; mobile recharges; bill payments; online games and much more! Get encrypted calling and messaging on 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G, and WiFi connections without using a VPN.
Conversations 💬on Botim are secured with AES-256 encryption, allowing you to connect in a fast, secure, and reliable way.

MAKE ENCRYPTED CALLS ACROSS BORDERS 📞
We're not just a Dubai video-calling app! Whether it's a free call to a country or a free call from another country, Botim lets you make secure and encrypted connections with people across the globe!

CONNECT IN GROUP CHATS & CALLS 👪
Botim lets you join secure and private group chats with up to 500 contacts and make group video calls with up to 21 people at the same time!

MAKE PHONE PAYMENTS & RECHARGES💸
Need to pay an Etisalat bill? Have to make a mobile top-up? We've got you! Make secure bill payments and mobile recharges for every major network provider across the world, including:
UAE: Etisalat, DU
India: Airtel, Vodafone, BSL, Jio, MTL, Vi India, Pakistan: Telenor, Ufone, Warid, Zong, Jazz Philippines: Globe, Cherry Mobile, Smart (SunCellular)
Bangladesh: Teletalk, Robi, Banglalink, Airtel, Grameenphone

BECOME A BOTIM VIP MEMBER🌟
Subscribe and upgrade to an ad-free experience with Botim’s VIP Membership program! Get early access to upcoming features and enjoy higher network quality, HD calling, background blur, and an exclusive VIP badge on your Botim profile!

BOTIM MONEY💰
Sending and Receiving money has never been this easy. With Botim’s fast and secure International Money Transfer services, send money anytime, anywhere.

International and Local Money Transfer:
If you're using Botim in the UAE, you can quickly and easily send money to your loved ones 💕. Experience the power of seamless, borderless money transfer across 170+ countries with Botim!

BOTIM SMART 🤓
Introducing Botim Smart, the all-in-one solution for government services, bill payments, and home services. With everything you need in one place and easy access from your phone, life is simple and easy.

Emirates ID Issue and Renewal 🆔

With just a few taps on your smartphone, and without visiting a government office, you can submit your application and receive your new Emirates ID within a few days.

BOTIM STORES: Experience the best of intuitive conversational commerce🛒. From groceries to fashion, and electronics to home decor, you can have everything delivered to your doorstep in the most convenient of ways.

BOTIM HOME: Your one-stop solution for all kinds of important services you could have asked for. Be it home services🏠, pharmacy💊, or cleaning services🧹, we've got you covered.

CONNECT AND COMPETE IN ONLINE GAMES
Stay entertained with games 🎮on Botim! Connect with players in live voice chats and climb the ranks in popular games such as YouDraw, YouKout, and YouLudo!

STEP INTO A HEALTHIER LIFE
Use the in-app step counter which integrates with the Health app and uses Apple Health Kit to keep track of your daily movements🚶.

QURAN KAREEM AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Discover the Holy Quran with Botim! Use the explore section to access verses from the Holy Quran in HD quality 📖 .
*Operator data charges may apply.

All Fintech services provided by Botim are powered by Payby, a UAE Central Bank Licensed Entity

Privacy Policy: https://botim.me/terms #privacy
Terms of Service: https://botim.me/terms/
descriptionShort: Botim is an ultra app for voice & video calls, money transfers, payments +more.

title:
Botim - Video and Voice Call
3.15.0

creator: Algento Cloud Computing Limited
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Botim - making your life easier and simpler 🙌

Botim, the most loved and trusted communication platform has transformed into an ultra platform 🚀. The new intuitive interface and advanced features aim at performing multiple tasks for you, offering you ease and convenience every day along with complete security. No matter where you stay in the world, you can interact, and share all you like with your loved ones. 💙

Download Botim and make the most of the following services:

BOTIM VOIP: Enjoy secure and private group video and voice calls; digital KYC; easy money transfers; built-in emoji dashboards; mobile recharges; bill payments; online games and much more! Get encrypted calling and messaging on 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G, and WiFi connections without using a VPN.
Conversations 💬on Botim are secured with AES-256 encryption, allowing you to connect in a fast, secure, and reliable way.

MAKE ENCRYPTED CALLS ACROSS BORDERS 📞
We're not just a Dubai video-calling app! Whether it's a free call to a country or a free call from another country, Botim lets you make secure and encrypted connections with people across the globe!

CONNECT IN GROUP CHATS & CALLS 👪
Botim lets you join secure and private group chats with up to 500 contacts and make group video calls with up to 21 people at the same time!

MAKE PHONE PAYMENTS & RECHARGES💸
Need to pay an Etisalat bill? Have to make a mobile top-up? We've got you! Make secure bill payments and mobile recharges for every major network provider across the world, including:
UAE: Etisalat, DU
India: Airtel, Vodafone, BSL, Jio, MTL, Vi India, Pakistan: Telenor, Ufone, Warid, Zong, Jazz Philippines: Globe, Cherry Mobile, Smart (SunCellular)
Bangladesh: Teletalk, Robi, Banglalink, Airtel, Grameenphone

BECOME A BOTIM VIP MEMBER🌟
Subscribe and upgrade to an ad-free experience with Botim’s VIP Membership program! Get early access to upcoming features and enjoy higher network quality, HD calling, background blur, and an exclusive VIP badge on your Botim profile!

BOTIM MONEY💰
Sending and Receiving money has never been this easy. With Botim’s fast and secure International Money Transfer services, send money anytime, anywhere.

International and Local Money Transfer:
If you're using Botim in the UAE, you can quickly and easily send money to your loved ones 💕. Experience the power of seamless, borderless money transfer across 170+ countries with Botim!

BOTIM SMART 🤓
Introducing Botim Smart, the all-in-one solution for government services, bill payments, and home services. With everything you need in one place and easy access from your phone, life is simple and easy.

Emirates ID Issue and Renewal 🆔

With just a few taps on your smartphone, and without visiting a government office, you can submit your application and receive your new Emirates ID within a few days.

BOTIM STORES: Experience the best of intuitive conversational commerce🛒. From groceries to fashion, and electronics to home decor, you can have everything delivered to your doorstep in the most convenient of ways.

BOTIM HOME: Your one-stop solution for all kinds of important services you could have asked for. Be it home services🏠, pharmacy💊, or cleaning services🧹, we've got you covered.

CONNECT AND COMPETE IN ONLINE GAMES
Stay entertained with games 🎮on Botim! Connect with players in live voice chats and climb the ranks in popular games such as YouDraw, YouKout, and YouLudo!

STEP INTO A HEALTHIER LIFE
Use the in-app step counter which integrates with the Health app and uses Apple Health Kit to keep track of your daily movements🚶.

QURAN KAREEM AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Discover the Holy Quran with Botim! Use the explore section to access verses from the Holy Quran in HD quality 📖 .
*Operator data charges may apply.

All Fintech services provided by Botim are powered by Payby, a UAE Central Bank Licensed Entity

Privacy Policy: https://botim.me/terms #privacy
Terms of Service: https://botim.me/terms/

3.21.2

creator: Algento Cloud Computing Limited
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Botim - making your life easier and simpler 🙌

Botim, the most loved and trusted communication platform has transformed into an ultra platform 🚀. The new intuitive interface and advanced features aim at performing multiple tasks for you, offering you ease and convenience every day along with complete security. No matter where you stay in the world, you can interact, and share all you like with your loved ones. 💙

Download Botim and make the most of the following services:

BOTIM VOIP: Enjoy secure and private group video and voice calls; digital KYC; easy money transfers; built-in emoji dashboards; mobile recharges; bill payments; online games and much more! Get encrypted calling and messaging on 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G, and WiFi connections without using a VPN.
Conversations 💬on Botim are secured with AES-256 encryption, allowing you to connect in a fast, secure, and reliable way.

MAKE ENCRYPTED CALLS ACROSS BORDERS 📞
We're not just a Dubai video-calling app! Whether it's a free call to a country or a free call from another country, Botim lets you make secure and encrypted connections with people across the globe!

CONNECT IN GROUP CHATS & CALLS 👪
Botim lets you join secure and private group chats with up to 500 contacts and make group video calls with up to 21 people at the same time!

MAKE PHONE PAYMENTS & RECHARGES💸
Need to pay an Etisalat bill? Have to make a mobile top-up? We've got you! Make secure bill payments and mobile recharges for every major network provider across the world, including:
UAE: Etisalat, DU
India: Airtel, Vodafone, BSL, Jio, MTL, Vi India, Pakistan: Telenor, Ufone, Warid, Zong, Jazz Philippines: Globe, Cherry Mobile, Smart (SunCellular)
Bangladesh: Teletalk, Robi, Banglalink, Airtel, Grameenphone

BECOME A BOTIM VIP MEMBER🌟
Subscribe and upgrade to an ad-free experience with Botim’s VIP Membership program! Get early access to upcoming features and enjoy higher network quality, HD calling, background blur, and an exclusive VIP badge on your Botim profile!

BOTIM MONEY💰
Sending and Receiving money has never been this easy. With Botim’s fast and secure International Money Transfer services, send money anytime, anywhere.

International and Local Money Transfer:
If you're using Botim in the UAE, you can quickly and easily send money to your loved ones 💕. Experience the power of seamless, borderless money transfer across 170+ countries with Botim!

BOTIM SMART 🤓
Introducing Botim Smart, the all-in-one solution for government services, bill payments, and home services. With everything you need in one place and easy access from your phone, life is simple and easy.

Emirates ID Issue and Renewal 🆔

With just a few taps on your smartphone, and without visiting a government office, you can submit your application and receive your new Emirates ID within a few days.

BOTIM STORES: Experience the best of intuitive conversational commerce🛒. From groceries to fashion, and electronics to home decor, you can have everything delivered to your doorstep in the most convenient of ways.

BOTIM HOME: Your one-stop solution for all kinds of important services you could have asked for. Be it home services🏠, pharmacy💊, or cleaning services🧹, we've got you covered.

CONNECT AND COMPETE IN ONLINE GAMES
Stay entertained with games 🎮on Botim! Connect with players in live voice chats and climb the ranks in popular games such as YouDraw, YouKout, and YouLudo!

STEP INTO A HEALTHIER LIFE
Use the in-app step counter which integrates with the Health app and uses Apple Health Kit to keep track of your daily movements🚶.

QURAN KAREEM AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Discover the Holy Quran with Botim! Use the explore section to access verses from the Holy Quran in HD quality 📖 .
*Operator data charges may apply.

All Fintech services provided by Botim are powered by Payby, a UAE Central Bank Licensed Entity
